<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: chaotic crowd, angry men, tension>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Mikolka: “I’ll teach you to kick!”  

<blank line>

Mikolka: “It’s my property!”  
Crowd: “He’ll crush her!”  
Crowd: “He’ll kill her!”  

---
<setup: desperate mare, crowd jeering, violence>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Mikolka: “Thrash her! Why have you stopped?”  

<blank line>

Crowd: “She’s a tough one!”  
Spectator: “Fetch an axe! Finish her off!”  
Mikolka: “Look out!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Mikolka violently beats a mare in front of a cheering crowd, demonstrating cruelty and indifference to suffering.
